titleStmt.title: Some short remarks upon Mr. Lock's book in answer to Mr. Lounds, and several other books and pamphlets concerning coin. By Sir Richard Temple, knight of the bath, and baronet.
titleStmt.author: Temple, Richard, Sir, 1634-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Baldwin, near the Oxford-Arms Inn in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
